Package org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.analyze

Class AnalyzeFileInfoProvider

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.analyze.AnalyzeFileInfoProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnalyzeInfoProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnalyzeFileInfoProviderImpl, AnalyzeParquetInfoProvider
public abstract class AnalyzeFileInfoProvider extends Object implements AnalyzeInfoProvider
Implementation of AnalyzeInfoProvider for file-based tables.

    • getMetadataInfoCollector

      public MetadataInfoCollector getMetadataInfoCollector(BasicTablesRequests basicRequests, TableInfo tableInfo, FormatSelection selection, PlannerSettings settings, Supplier<org.apache.calcite.rel.core.TableScan> tableScanSupplier, List<SchemaPath> interestingColumns, MetadataType metadataLevel, int segmentColumnsCount) throws IOException

    • getParentLocationExpression

      public NamedExpression getParentLocationExpression(SchemaPath locationField)
      Description copied from interface: AnalyzeInfoProvider
      Returns expression which may be used to determine parent location for specific table data, i.e. segment location. For example, for file-based tables, such expression will be `parentPath` function call.
      Specified by:
      getParentLocationExpression in interface AnalyzeInfoProvider
      Parameters:
      locationField - location field
      Returns:
      expression to determine parent location
